metadata.title: CVE-2021-43305 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Clickhouse's LZ4 compression codec when parsing amalicious query. There is no verification that the copy operations in theLZ4::decompressImpl loop and especially the arbitrary copy operationwildCopy<copy_amount>(op, ip, copy_end), don’t exceed the destinationbuffer’s limits. This issue is very similar to CVE-2021-43304, but thevulnerable copy operation is in a different wildCopy call.

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
